Others: The New York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets by a final score of 111-105 last night, winning their fourth consecutive game to open up the 2024 NBA preseason.
The starters did not play in the game, giving others a chance to shine.
Precious Achiuwa, a key part of the Knicksâ€™ success despite many injuries last season, finished with 20 points and 16 rebounds, leading the way to victory.
Deuce McBride continued to impress with 18 points and 5 assists, while new addition Cam Payne had 16 points and 8 assists of his own.
